
## Key Design Decisions

✅ **Title as Insight**: "AI model sizes have grown 1000x in four years" — states the finding, not just "Model Parameters Over Time"

✅ **Logarithmic Scale**: Essential for exponential data. Linear scale would compress early growth and make 2024 point disappear off the chart

✅ **Accent Highlighting**: GPT-4 (2023) marked in red to show the inflection point before the Gemini Ultra explosion

✅ **1000x Annotation**: Visual box highlighting the 2020-2024 period to emphasize the acceleration window

✅ **Professional Palette**: Economist Blue (#1A476F) for primary data, Red (#C74634) for accent highlight, avoiding rainbow/bright colors

✅ **Clean Axes**: Removed top/right spines, subtle gridlines, clear ticks pointing inward

✅ **Data Labels**: All values labeled directly on points for precise reading without legend cluttering

The chart effectively communicates that AI scaling hasn't been linear—it's exponential acceleration compressed into just four years.","stop_reason":null,"session_id":"d94d9778-64fa-4d84-a17e-c65356d69c22","total_cost_usd":0.0332417,"usage":{"input_tokens":10,"cache_creation_input_tokens":3134,"cache_read_input_tokens":69742,"output_tokens":4468,"server_tool_use":{"web_search_requests":0,"web_fetch_requests":0},"service_tier":"standard","cache_creation":{"ephemeral_1h_input_tokens":3134,"ephemeral_5m_input_tokens":0},"inference_geo":"","iterations":[],"speed":"standard"},"modelUsage":{"claude-haiku-4-5-20251001":{"inputTokens":10,"outputTokens":4468,"cacheReadInputTokens":69742,"cacheCreationInputTokens":3134,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.0332417,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":32000}},"permission_denials":[{"tool_name":"mcp__plugin_playwright_playwright__browser_run_code","tool_use_id":"toolu_01W8KdYZGbPjad27TDcdwPm4","tool_input":{"code":"
async (page) => {
  const svg = `
<svg viewBox="0 0 1200 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" font-family="Inter, Helvetica, sans-serif">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="1200" height="700" fill="#F5F5F5"/>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="50" y="45" font-size="28" font-weight="600" fill="#1A1A1A" letter-spacing="-0.5">
    AI model sizes have grown 1000x in four years
  </text>
  
  <!-- Subtitle -->
  <text x="50" y="75" font-size="14" fill="#666666">
    Number of parameters in largest models, billions (log scale)
  </text>
  
  <!-- Chart area background -->
  <rect x="80" y="110" width="1050" height="500" fill="white" stroke="#E0E0E0" stroke-width="1"/>
  
  <!-- Grid lines (subtle) -->
  <line x1="80" y1="580" x2="1130" y2="580" stroke="#D0D0D0" stroke-width="0.8" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  <line x1="80" y1="507" x2="1130" y2="507" stroke="#D0D0D0" stroke-width="0.8" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  <line x1="80" y1="434" x2="1130" y2="434" stroke="#D0D0D0" stroke-width="0.8" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  <line x1="80" y1="361" x2="1130" y2="361" stroke="#D0D0D0" stroke-width="0.8" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  <line x1="80" y1="288" x2="1130" y2="288" stroke="#D0D0D0" stroke-width="0.8" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  <line x1="80" y1="215" x2="1130" y2="215" stroke="#D0D0D0" stroke-width="0.8" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  
  <!-- Y-axis (left spine) -->
  <line x1="80" y1="110" x2="80" y2="610" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  
  <!-- X-axis (bottom spine) -->
  <line x1="80" y1="610" x2="1130" y2="610" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  
  <!-- Y-axis ticks and labels (log scale: 0.1, 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000) -->
  <!-- 0.1B at y=573 -->
  <line x1="75" y1="573" x2="80" y2="573" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="70" y="578" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="end">0.1</text>
  
  <!-- 1B at y=500 -->
  <line x1="75" y1="500" x2="80" y2="500" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="70" y="505" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="end">1</text>
  
  <!-- 10B at y=427 -->
  <line x1="75" y1="427" x2="80" y2="427" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="70" y="432" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="end">10</text>
  
  <!-- 100B at y=354 -->
  <line x1="75" y1="354" x2="80" y2="354" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="70" y="359" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="end">100</text>
  
  <!-- 1000B at y=281 -->
  <line x1="75" y1="281" x2="80" y2="281" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="70" y="286" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="end">1,000</text>
  
  <!-- 10000B at y=208 -->
  <line x1="75" y1="208" x2="80" y2="208" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="70" y="213" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="end">10,000</text>
  
  <!-- Y-axis label -->
  <text x="25" y="360" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(-90 25 360)">
    Parameters (billions, log scale)
  </text>
  
  <!-- X-axis ticks and labels -->
  <!-- 2017 at x=110 -->
  <line x1="110" y1="610" x2="110" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="110" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2017</text>
  
  <!-- 2018 at x=195 -->
  <line x1="195" y1="610" x2="195" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="195" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2018</text>
  
  <!-- 2019 at x=280 -->
  <line x1="280" y1="610" x2="280" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="280" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2019</text>
  
  <!-- 2020 at x=365 -->
  <line x1="365" y1="610" x2="365" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="365" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2020</text>
  
  <!-- 2021 at x=450 -->
  <line x1="450" y1="610" x2="450" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="450" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2021</text>
  
  <!-- 2022 at x=535 -->
  <line x1="535" y1="610" x2="535" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="535" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2022</text>
  
  <!-- 2023 at x=620 -->
  <line x1="620" y1="610" x2="620" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="620" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2023</text>
  
  <!-- 2024 at x=705 -->
  <line x1="705" y1="610" x2="705" y2="615" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="705" y="635" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">2024</text>
  
  <!-- Data line (primary: Economist Blue) -->
  <polyline points="110,569 195,551 280,516 365,427 450,354 535,281 620,208 705,110" 
            stroke="#1A476F" stroke-width="3" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  
  <!-- Data points -->
  <circle cx="110" cy="569" r="5" fill="#1A476F"/>
  <circle cx="195" cy="551" r="5" fill="#1A476F"/>
  <circle cx="280" cy="516" r="5" fill="#1A476F"/>
  <circle cx="365" cy="427" r="5" fill="#1A476F"/>
  <circle cx="450" cy="354" r="5" fill="#1A476F"/>
  <circle cx="535" cy="281" r="5" fill="#1A476F"/>
  <circle cx="620" cy="208" r="5" fill="#C74634"/> <!-- GPT-4: Highlight with Red accent -->
  <circle cx="705" cy="110" r="5" fill="#1A476F"/>
  
  <!-- Data labels -->
  <text x="110" y="595" font-size="11" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">0.094B</text>
  <text x="195" y="575" font-size="11" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">0.31B</text>
  <text x="280" y="535" font-size="11" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">1.5B</text>
  <text x="365" y="450" font-size="11" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">17B</text>
  <text x="450" y="375" font-size="11" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">175B</text>
  <text x="535" y="305" font-size="11" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">540B</text>
  <text x="620" y="180" font-size="11" fill="#C74634" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="600">1,800B</text>
  <text x="705" y="85" font-size="11" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle">12,000B</text>
  
  <!-- Annotation for GPT-4 -->
  <line x1="620" y1="190" x2="650" y2="150" stroke="#C74634" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
  <rect x="650" y="130" width="180" height="50" fill="#FFF5F5" stroke="#C74634" stroke-width="1.5" rx="3"/>
  <text x="740" y="150" font-size="12" fill="#333333" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="600">GPT-4</text>
  <text x="740" y="168" font-size="11" fill="#666666" text-anchor="middle">1.8 trillion parameters</text>
  
  <!-- Highlight box for 1000x growth (2020-2024) -->
  <rect x="350" y="100" width="370" height="540" fill="none" stroke="#C74634" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" rx="4" opacity="0.6"/>
  <text x="1060" y="135" font-size="12" fill="#C74634" font-weight="600">1000x</text>
  <text x="1060" y="152" font-size="11" fill="#C74634">growth</text>
  <text x="1060" y="169" font-size="11" fill="#C74634">2020→2024</text>
  
  <!-- Source attribution -->
  <text x="50" y="680" font-size="11" fill="#666666">
    Source: Epoch AI, Trends in Machine Learning 2024 | Chart: Claude Code
  </text>
</svg>
  `;
  
  await page.setContent(svg);
  return "Chart created successfully";
}
